item.description:
Friday, October 30th – Chinese Art Exhibit Reception, "For the Love of Nature"

Chinese Brush Paintings by Son-Mey Chiu (regular attendee of Friday Night Fellowship)

Time: 4pm to 6pm

Location: Harvard University School of Education

Gutman Library

6 Appian Way

Cambridge, MA

Description: You are cordially invited by the artist, Son-Mey Chiu, to attend her Chinese Art Exhibition and/or the reception. Exhibit runs from October 19th to November 6th.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday, October 30th – Chinese Art Exhibit Reception, "For the Love of Nature"
